messages.title: THE LIB DEMS ARE WINNING
messages.content: European Election results here in the East Midlands show the Lib Dems can win and are the Remain party that can win in Nottingham.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone.
The Liberal Democrats will put Britain at the forefront of combating carbon neutral at the earliest possible date.

mentions.tacticalSituation: European Election results here in the East Midlands show the Lib Dems can win and are the Remain party that can win in Nottingham.

issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone.
issues.environment: Climate change and air pollution threaten our future. Working with the EU enables us to work together to protect our planet.

images.caption: Barry Holliday, Liberal Democrats candidate for Nottingham South, with campaign slogans and party branding.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet photo shows results of the East Midland European Election results, 2019 to highlight the tactical message.
